message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $11,500. I believe it offers excellent value at this price, considering its worth to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,000? This would be a mutually beneficial agreement.
I'm willing to consider your proposal, but I'm still a bit hesitant. How about we try $10,750? I think this is a more reasonable price for the product.
